title: Dinnerbone：乐高对Mojang的重要性
author: kaho
txt_content:
@Dinnerbone 
Serious meetings at Mojang often devolve into Lego building competitions.
比较庄重的Mojang会议往往会逐渐发展成乐高建筑大赛。






（卧槽，居然把公鸡和鳄鱼弄出来了）

replies.author: Terry39
replies.txt_content: 卖萌可耻

replies.txt_content:
